title: Property Manager on Site! We take care of our residents!
posting_body: ['Brooks Crossing Apartments', 'Visit our community today!', '8050 Taylor Road Riverdale, GA 30274', 'show contact info', 'Unit Rates:', '$1243/month', 'Unit Type:', '1-BR 1-BA', 'Unit Size:', '725 sq ft', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'What you’ll find in our community:', '✓ Business Center', '✓ Clubhouse', '✓ Courtyard', '✓ Fitness Center', '✓ Gated', '✓ Maintenance on site', '✓ Picnic Areas', '✓ Property Manager on Site', '✓ Sparkling Pool', '✓ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '✓ Covered Parking', '✓ Fax/Copy Services', '✓ Laundry Facilities', '✓ Monthly Resident Events', '✓ Multi Use Room', '✓ Online Services', '✓ Package Service', '✓ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '✓ Sports Courts', '✓ Tennis Court', 'Description:', 'Brooks Crossing Apartments is in a fabulous location.', 'Not only are we within walking distance to public transportation , but we are only minutes from Hartsfield Jackson Airport, Clayton State University, Southern Regional Medical and numerous restaurants .', 'This unit comes with:', '✓ Air Conditioning', '✓ Cable Ready', '✓ Ceiling Fans', '✓ Deck', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Disposal', '✓ Fireplace', '✓ Freezer', '✓ Heating', '✓ High Speed Internet Access', '✓ Range', '✓ Refrigerator', '✓ Tub/Shower', '✓ Vaulted Ceilings', '✓ Walk-In Closets', '✓ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '✓ Wi-Fi', '✓ Window Coverings', 'Call or visit our website to schedule a personal tour!', 'Office Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Property Management:', 'Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'DA311A3086094D']
